pullRequest.title: add scheduling constraint for kube nodes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of the Change
Add scheduling constraint for kube nodes instead of trying to do lease management when conditions and taints change.

commit.message: add scheduling constraint for kube nodes instead of trying to do lease management when conditions and taints change

nodes.bodyText: Do we depend on GC process here to do the cleanup?
What if node is not there? We should check for null at least + double check that an exception is not thrown if a node is missing or due to other problems.
